text_001.title: At the Supermarket
text_001.content: Jeg går i supermarkedet hver onsdag. Jeg køber mælk, brød og frugt.
text_001.translation: I go to the supermarket every Wednesday. I buy milk, bread and fruit.

text_002.title: Greetings
text_002.content: Hej! Hvordan har du det? Jeg har det godt, tak.
text_002.translation: Hello! How are you? I am fine, thank you.

exercises.question: What is 'Hello' in Danish?
exercises.explanation: Hej is the most common Danish greeting

exercises.question: How do you say 'Thank you' in Danish?
According to the text, what does 'Hvordan har du det?' mean?
exercises.explanation: This is a common way to ask how someone is doing
